text: ttohan naneun geudeul-eul banghwangke hago geudeul-ege wiseonjeog huimang-eul jo seonghal geos-imyeo geudeul-ege myeonglyeonghayeo gachugdeul-ui gwileul jaleuge hago geudeul ege myeonglyeonghayeo hananim-ui changjoleul byeongyeongke halila hadeola geuleona ha nanim-eul daesinhayeo satan-eul taeghaneun janeun bunmyeonghi sonhaeleul bol geos-ila
